languages.text: {n}Абеляр вздыхает, его голос начинает немного звенеть.{/n} "Я допускаю, что в обычных обстоятельствах такой шаг как нарушение уединения Навигатора приравнивается к самоубийству. Сейчас же наша с вами жертва может предотвратить гибель {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}, пустотного судна {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} и всего его экипажа, арсенала и снаряжения. Выбор очевиден".

traits.locale_text: {n}Абеляр вздыхает, его голос начинает немного звенеть.{/n} "Я допускаю, что в обычных обстоятельствах такой шаг как нарушение уединения Навигатора приравнивается к самоубийству. Сейчас же наша с вами жертва может предотвратить гибель {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}, пустотного судна {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} и всего его экипажа, арсенала и снаряжения. Выбор очевиден".

languages.text: {n}Abelard sighs before raising his voice slightly.{/n} "I concur that, under ordinary circumstances, interrupting the Navigator's solitude would be equivalent to suicide. Right now, however, our sacrifice could prevent the demise of a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, a voidship of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, and all her crew, armaments, and equipment. The choice is obvious."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр вздыхает, его голос начинает немного звенеть.{/n} "Я допускаю, что в обычных обстоятельствах такой шаг как нарушение уединения Навигатора приравнивается к самоубийству. Сейчас же наша с вами жертва может предотвратить гибель {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}, пустотного судна {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} и всего его экипажа, арсенала и снаряжения. Выбор очевиден".

The choice is obvious."

{n}Abelard sighs before raising his voice slightly.{/n} "I concur that, under ordinary circumstances, interrupting the Navigator's solitude would be equivalent to suicide. Right now, however, our sacrifice could prevent the demise of a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, a voidship of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, and all her crew, armaments, and equipment. The choice is obvious."

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德叹了口气，之后稍稍提高了音调。{/n}“我同意您的看法。通常情况下，闯入导航者圣殿无异于自杀。可现在，只要我们做出牺牲，就可以拯救一位{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}的生命，拯救这艘{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的虚空舰，以及这艘船上的所有船员、武器与设备。两者孰轻孰重，显而易见。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard sighs before raising his voice slightly.{/n} "I concur that, under ordinary circumstances, interrupting the Navigator's solitude would be equivalent to suicide. Right now, however, our sacrifice could prevent the demise of a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, a voidship of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, and all her crew, armaments, and equipment. The choice is obvious."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德叹了口气，之后稍稍提高了音调。{/n}“我同意您的看法。通常情况下，闯入导航者圣殿无异于自杀。可现在，只要我们做出牺牲，就可以拯救一位{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}的生命，拯救这艘{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的虚空舰，以及这艘船上的所有船员、武器与设备。两者孰轻孰重，显而易见。”

languages.text: {n}Abelard suspira antes de levantar ligeramente la voz.{/n} «Estoy de acuerdo en que, en circunstancias ordinarias, interrumpir la soledad del Navegante sería un suicidio. No obstante, ahora mismo, nuestro sacrificio podría evitar el fin de una {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}, una nave del vacío del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} y toda su tripulación, armamento y equipamiento. La decisión es evidente».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard sighs before raising his voice slightly.{/n} "I concur that, under ordinary circumstances, interrupting the Navigator's solitude would be equivalent to suicide. Right now, however, our sacrifice could prevent the demise of a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, a voidship of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, and all her crew, armaments, and equipment. The choice is obvious."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard suspira antes de levantar ligeramente la voz.{/n} «Estoy de acuerdo en que, en circunstancias ordinarias, interrumpir la soledad del Navegante sería un suicidio. No obstante, ahora mismo, nuestro sacrificio podría evitar el fin de una {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}, una nave del vacío del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} y toda su tripulación, armamento y equipamiento. La decisión es evidente».

languages.text: {n}アベラルドはため息をつき、その後わずかに声を上げた。{/n}「普通の状況下では、航宙士の孤独を妨害することは自殺に等しいと同意します。しかし、現時点では、我々の犠牲によって{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}のヴォイドシップ、その全乗組員、武装、装備の消滅を防ぐことができます。どちらを取るかは明白です」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard sighs before raising his voice slightly.{/n} "I concur that, under ordinary circumstances, interrupting the Navigator's solitude would be equivalent to suicide. Right now, however, our sacrifice could prevent the demise of a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, a voidship of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, and all her crew, armaments, and equipment. The choice is obvious."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドはため息をつき、その後わずかに声を上げた。{/n}「普通の状況下では、航宙士の孤独の邪魔をすることは自殺に等しいと同意します。しかし、現時点では、私たちの犠牲によって{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}のヴォイドシップである{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}とそのクルー、兵器、装備の消滅を防ぐことができます。どちらを取るかは明白です」

{n}アベラルドはため息をつき、その後わずかに声を上げた。{/n}「普通の状況下では、航宙士の孤独を妨害することは自殺に等しいと同意します。しかし、現時点では、我々の犠牲によって{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}のヴォイドシップ、その全乗組員、武装、装備の消滅を防ぐことができます。どちらを取るかは明白です」

languages.text: {n}Abélard soupire, puis hausser légèrement la voix.{/n} « Je veux bien admettre qu'en temps normal, interrompre la solitude d'un navigateur reviendrait à chercher sa propre mort. Mais aujourd'hui, ce sacrifice pourrait empêcher la perte d'une {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchande{/g}, d'un vaisseau de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} et de tout son équipage, son armement et son matériel. Le choix est évident. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard sighs before raising his voice slightly.{/n} "I concur that, under ordinary circumstances, interrupting the Navigator's solitude would be equivalent to suicide. Right now, however, our sacrifice could prevent the demise of a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, a voidship of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, and all her crew, armaments, and equipment. The choice is obvious."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard soupire, puis hausser légèrement la voix.{/n} « Je veux bien admettre qu'en temps normal, interrompre la solitude d'un navigateur reviendrait à chercher sa propre mort. Mais aujourd'hui, ce sacrifice pourrait empêcher la perte d'une {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchande{/g}, d'un vaisseau de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} et de tout son équipage, son armement et son matériel. Le choix est évident. »

languages.text: {n}Abelard seufzt und erhebt dann seine Stimme ein wenig.{/n} "Ich räume ein, dass die Unterbrechung der Einsamkeit des Navigators unter normalen Umständen einem Selbstmord gleichkäme. Im Moment jedoch könnte unser Opfer den Untergang einer {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändlerin{/g}, eines Raumschiffs des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} samt Crew, Bewaffnung und Ausrüstung verhindern. Die Entscheidung ist offensichtlich."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard sighs before raising his voice slightly.{/n} "I concur that, under ordinary circumstances, interrupting the Navigator's solitude would be equivalent to suicide. Right now, however, our sacrifice could prevent the demise of a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, a voidship of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, and all her crew, armaments, and equipment. The choice is obvious."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard seufzt und erhebt dann seine Stimme ein wenig.{/n} "Ich räume ein, dass die Unterbrechung der Einsamkeit des Navigators unter normalen Umständen einem Selbstmord gleichkäme. Im Moment jedoch könnte unser Opfer den Untergang einer {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändlerin{/g}, eines Raumschiffs des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} samt Crew, Bewaffnung und Ausrüstung verhindern. Die Entscheidung ist offensichtlich."

languages.original_text: {n}Abelard sighs before raising his voice slightly.{/n} "I concur that, under ordinary circumstances, interrupting the Navigator's solitude would be equivalent to suicide. Right now, however, our sacrifice could prevent the demise of a Rogue Trader, a voidship of the Imperium, and all her crew, armaments, and equipment. The choice is obvious."

languages.text: {n}Abelard, iç çekip sesini hafifçe yükseltiyor.{/n} "Aynı fikirdeyim, normal şartlarda Rotacı'nın yalnızlığına müdahale etmek intihar anlamına gelir. Lakin şu an böyle bir fedakârlıkta bulunmak bir {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir'in{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'un{/g} bir uçsuz gemisinin ve geminin tüm mürettebatının, silahlarının ve ekipmanının yok olmasının önüne geçebilir. Yapılacak seçim belli."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard sighs before raising his voice slightly.{/n} "I concur that, under ordinary circumstances, interrupting the Navigator's solitude would be equivalent to suicide. Right now, however, our sacrifice could prevent the demise of a {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}, a voidship of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, and all her crew, armaments, and equipment. The choice is obvious."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard, iç çekip sesini hafifçe yükseltiyor.{/n} "Aynı fikirdeyim, normal şartlarda Rotacı'nın yalnızlığına müdahale etmek intihar anlamına gelir. Lakin şu an böyle bir fedakârlıkta bulunmak bir {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}'in, {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'un bir uçsuz gemisinin ve geminin tüm mürettebatının, silahlarının ve ekipmanının yok olmasının önüne geçebilir. Yapılacak seçim belli."
